ok, 1 more response

Phobia didn't think they had two days, when he'd left the 
Cybertronian Fire he'd told Kluster that he'd be back in a week.

"Yes Crew Leader, but I suggest we try to move a little faster, the 
more we delay the greater the chance Megatron would return, He might 
get the wrong idea about your plan. The spiderbot hesitated "We 
wouldn't want that now would we?" he turned and exited the quarters 
wondering how he could get a message to the Cybertronian Fire that he 
may be late. He couldn't risk the consequences of breaking thier 
agreement.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat:;
> 
> She looked at Phobia. "Oh please don't call me leader. Crew Leader, 
> OK, But not just leader." She took the plans and looked them over.
> She looked up at Phobia.  "Thank you, if this plan is successful, 
we 
> will take you back with us to Cybertron if you wish.  I'm not 
looking 
> for a council seat, just looking out for my team."  She looked at 
> Drillbit,"Tell Time Bomb, Land Mine and the others to join me in my 
> quarters.  Terrorsaur too.  But not Megatron.  I want this to be a 
> suprize for him.  When we have devised a perfect plan, then 
megatron 
> will learn of this, but not before." 
> 
> She smiled and nodded to Phobia. "Yes, I shall be by your ship in a 
> day or two.  I will need some of those weapons of yours to make 
this 
> work."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Phobia winced at the kindness KitKat was showing, she was showing 
> yo 
> > much gratitude where a leader should merely show adaquacy (I 
think 
> > thats the right term)
> > 
> > "Of course leader, here you are." he extended his hand and 
offered 
> > the holocube to KitKat. "Now if you'll excuse me I have some 
> business 
> > to attend to on my ship. If you'd like to stop out later, I'll be 
> > glad to supply a manifest of my cargo." Phobia steps back 
carefully 
> > trying not to undermind his new superior. he awaits her approval 
> > before exiting.
> >
